## Zadanie 1

```{r}
library(spData)
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
punkt <- st_point(c(20, 10)) %>% 
  st_sfc(crs = st_crs(world)) %>%
  st_sf()
ggplot()+
  geom_sf(data = world)+
  geom_sf(data = punkt, size = 1, col = "red")+
  theme_light()
```

```{r}
linestring_matrix = rbind(c(1,7),
                          c(7,5),
                          c(5,8),
                          c(8,3),
                          c(3,6))
line <- st_linestring(linestring_matrix)
plot(line)
```


```{r}
polygon_list = list(rbind(c(13.9, 55), c(24.2, 55), c(24.2, 48.9), c(14, 48.9), c(13.9, 55)))

kwadrat <- st_polygon(polygon_list) %>%
  st_sfc(crs = 4326) %>%
  st_sf()

Polska <- world %>%
  filter(name_long == "Poland")

ggplot()+
  geom_sf(data = kwadrat)+
  geom_sf(data = Polska)
```
